## serialization.procedures.ProcedureSerializer.(constructor)

Constructs the procedure serializer.

Example usage: new ProcedureSerializer(MyProcedureModelClass, MyParameterModelClass)

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(procedureModelClass: ProcedureModelConstructor<ProcedureModel>, parameterModelClass: ParameterModelConstructor<ParameterModel>);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  procedureModelClass | ProcedureModelConstructor&lt;ProcedureModel&gt; | The class (implementing IProcedureModel) that you want this serializer to deserialize. |
|  parameterModelClass | ParameterModelConstructor&lt;ParameterModel&gt; | The class (implementing IParameterModel) that you want this serializer to deserialize. |
